name: Waifu Battle Royale Redux 2.0 Electric Boogaloo Ultimate Origins
name_original: Waifu Battle Royale Redux 2.0 Electric Boogaloo Ultimate Origins
description:
Choose your waifus and have them fight for you in the ultimate dating experience!

Nominated Game of the Year 2023 in North Korea

Approved By Jesus El Christo Bryan Benjamin Jay-C Jr.

これはあなたの人生を変えるでしょう！
